subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] It's b-a-n-a-n-a-s!
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I was doing reverse speech before EVP, and it works. Not only that, spirits
and other entities talk backward too.  I had a reversing deck, but it broke
in our move. You can record yourself, and reverse it, use it for psycho
analysis. We're dealing with mind, not brain, so this stuff is universal.

F-S

On Tue, Nov 30, 2010 at 4:05 PM, Tim Woolworth <tjwoolworth@...>wrote:

>
>
> Don't know if you have heard of this guy, but John Oates has made a living
> claiming that reverse speech messages are the one way the unconscious cannot
> lie.  He also claims that reverse speech messages are almost always linked
> to the forward speech message.
>
> Some of his examples are quite intriguing, but I don't buy it fully yet.  I
> have recorded my own voice and played it backwards and got zilch.
>
> But, if there is some truth to it, maybe we should all be reversing some of
> our files from time to time just in case.  Wouldn't it be a startling find
> to have this be true not only of the living, but also in those who
> communicate through the box a well.
>
> http://www.reversespeech.com/Simple_Examples.htm
>
>  <http://www.reversespeech.com/Simple_Examples.htm>Tim
>
> On Tue, Nov 30, 2010 at 5:46 PM, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...
> > wrote:

>>
>> F-S
